'''Saurian Hunter's Reward''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Blazed Meat Stew]] with [[Kinich]]. The recipe for Blazed Meat Stew is found in a [[Chest]] in [[Huitztli Hill]], [[Natlan]].

Saurian Hunter's Reward increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''20'''% and CRIT DMG by '''20'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
